content.description: domain and range (2016 Fall, Quest, Question 7)

p.line: what do you know for sure about the _EMPHS_Domain and Range_EMPHE_ of Foo and Bar?
The Domain of Bar contains the number 42.
The Range of Foo is exactly numbers.
The Domain of Bar contains the range of Foo.
The Domain of Bar is exactly the range of Foo.

content.hint: refer to the definition of domain (input type) and range (output type)
